author: vicepool
title: ADAPlus - Pool Boost
description: Delegators who support small mission-driven SPO do not get rewards until the pool gains an impressive stake amount. SPO is also at a loss.

author: sergio.sp
title: ALMAGUA CO2
description: Global emissions reached a record 33,143 million tons of CO2 in 2018, in Colombia they reached 74,954 kilotonnes two years ago.

author: francek
title: Pre-installed stakepool boxes
description: Setting up a stakepool could be easier, however it currently requires considerable technical know-how and resources (time + money).

author: rhysmorgan
title: Staking DAO: Supporting Single SPOs
description: Ranking in Wallets and Pool Explorers favours big saturated pools encouraging saturated pools to split and centralise the network

author: sirpool
title: Delegation Matching Service
description:
It is difficult in collecting enough delegates to sustain the pool operation.
And few difference from other pools when choosing a pool.

author: cole.vt
title: Sustainable SPO's Impact & Stories
description: There isn't enough widespread community participation + story sharing about SPOs in the Cardano ecosystem globally, found in one place.

author: nvhieu
title: Simplify SPO operations in Vietnam
description: Most of the stake pools are running on common hosting providers (AWS, GCP, Azure). we need a self-reliant network rather than it is now.

author: skryptlabs
title: Cardsec 🔒: SPO Self-Audit Toolkit
description: There is a need for a 101 stake pool security guide and self-auditing tools for stake pool operators and developers running Cardano nodes.

author: felixweber
title: Mission& Vision driven SPO Networks
description: Pools set up to support the building of the Catalyst community & infrastructure are underrepresented in the ecosystem.

author: raz
title: Marketing Training for African SPOs
description: It's challenging being the 1st SPO in a country, on top of technical skills, SPOs need marketing + managerial skills to operate sustainably.

author: cole.vt
title: MissionDrivenPools Media Competiton
description: ADA holders get info overload choosing from 1000s of SPOs, using dry data + information sources. Should be easy to connect with MDPs.

author: gargiulo.gianni
title: Stakeboard: Social Staking Platform
description: To support a growing number of prosperous SPOs, delegating needs to be easier, more informative, more trust-inspiring, and more lucrative.

author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Open Source Guide: Off-Grid Pi Node
description: There isn't an open source guide & materials list for a proven Raspberry Pi Cardano Node running fully off grid.

author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Easy Node Deployment - [Revelar]
description: For new SPO's and developers, spinning up (non-local) Cardano nodes takes too much time.

author: akyar.ozgur
title: Eco SPOs to support Climate Action
description: Energy consumption of blockchains is on of the main question to the communities who aren't aware of Cardano.

author: bryan77
title: Stake Pool Key Documentation
description: Stake Pool cryptographic key creation and rotation procedures are difficult to understand, even for technically-adept operators.

author: xeeban
title: SPOs Supporting Community Projects
description: Small SPOs struggle to get delegation. Community projects and groups don't know how to run a stake pool. Let's bring these two together!

author: esgpool
title: Bare Metal Green Infrastructure
description: Most SPOs avail of large server houses to host their stake pool. Energy use isn't considered and ownership is remote. Bring it local to SPO.

author: co2poolada
title: A world map of green Cardano
description: Blockchain technology requires energy and is considered harmful to environment. It is difficult to identify green stakepools and offsets.

author: johnathan.lopez.a
title: SolarPowered Community Staking Pool
description: The blockchain power consumption. The development of sustainable Staking Pool by using renewable power technology to operate staking pool.

author: jadjei
title: Mission driven and Accountable!
description: How can we verify mission-driven stake pools are delivering on their promises?
